title: Glitch or computer??
body: At the moment, my game has been freezing whenever i try do do anything other than move or attack with the champ. When i open shop, look at stats, moving around items. Whenever i try, which is generally needed a lot, the game freezes for about 3 seconds before catching up, its it not dramatic in its effects on my playing but its still really annoying. Is this something to do with the game or is it my computer??????

replies.body: also when i enter the game it has the sounds but takes about 15 secs to actually show the map, when i alt tab i need 2 restart the game and exiting the game takes 4ever. None of this used 2 happen and i havent changed any settings.
you can try a repair install if you don't mind waiting... are you running any overlays? maybe something is hanging there? try disabling them?

> [{quoted}](name=Proxima Solaris,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=HOFHIjtN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-18T03:46:34.567+0000)
>
> you can try a repair install if you don't mind waiting... are you running any overlays? maybe something is hanging there? try disabling them?

So im rlly not smart with this stuff. What are overlays and is a repair install just uninstalling and reinstalling?
